name: Delarith
overview: Delarith is the story of an adventurer seeking treasure of the ancients. You must guide him through ancient ruins and… Wow, what a story! So silly isn't it? It is just a puzzle/platform game which you have to have to navigate with lots of luck and a little brain. The aim of Delarith is to collect 10 items to make the keys/biggers appear and then collect it and find exit. Easy? Delarith is again from old Spectrum days, it is never programmed on Spectrum but designed for it. You can understand this from level designs.
